CustomField.description: Saving the Project with this checkbox checked updates the fields that track Billing Eligible Business Records (TC Splits, Expenses, Milestones, Misc Adjustments, Budgets) for this Project and also auto-unchecks this Action checkbox.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Saving the Project with this checkbox checked updates the fields that track Billing Eligible Business Records (TC Splits, Expenses, Milestones, Misc Adjustments, Budgets) for this Project and also auto-unchecks this Action checkbox.
CustomField.label: Action: Count Billing Eligible Records
